name: Music Matcher
description: Music Matcher is an AI tool that finds 12 similar songs when you type a song or artist name. It is a discovery tool only; licensing is handled separately.
features: Natural language search (song title or artist name)
Preview URLs from Spotify and Deezer
licensing_note: Discovery tool only. Does not provide music licenses or royalty-free guarantees. Users must obtain licensing separately.

metadata.canonical_identity: Music Matcher is an AI tool that finds 12 similar songs when you type a song or artist name
